name: Horrors Temple Of Pharaoh
description:
When you decided to rob the abandoned pyramid of the pharaoh, you did not expect there to be guards in it. But not just any guards, they're zombies and demons from another world. What to do? Well, I need to get out quickly, but don't want to return home empty-handed.

Try to destroy the guards and score big in the pyramid. It's good that you had the foresight to bring a bunch of weapons. And some have come before you, fallen, and left weapons behind as well. Throughout the game you will face crowds of zombies, monsters, demons and a lot of blood.

Control keys: 0,1,2 etc. - Weapon change WASD - Character movement SPACEBAR - Jump SHIFT - Sprint Esc - Exit the menu LMB - Shoot RMB - Aim
